abstract: Ry Cooder spoke by telephone recently from his home in Santa Monica, Calif., about his new album and how it came about.  Here are edited excerpts of the conversation.
snippet: Ry Cooder spoke by telephone recently from his home in Santa Monica, Calif., about his new album and how it came about.  Here are edited excerpts of the conversation.

headline.main: Q. and A.: Ry Cooder on Woody Guthrie, Politics and a New Album
